EmailTemplate.name: 18-GEPS TO-Partner-Email-Operational-T001OY.Email - FN FBA pricing update
EmailTemplate.subject: FN FBA Europe and MEA Partner Product and Maintenance Services Price Catalogs update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> E-bulletin FN FBA Europe and MEA Partner Product and Maintenance Services Price Catalogs update Dear Nokia Partners,
The pricing team has issued updated FN FBA Partner Product and Maintenance Services Price Catalogs during the week of January 8-11, 2018. The FBA Equipment BOM Quotation tab has also been updated. Partners can access these new price-books via the Nokia PRM Partner Portal <[[https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/]]>. [Account ->Details -> Personal space links -> Partner Pricing folders] Key Highlights
- Improved pricing on GPON line card aligning market feedback - Generated with FN FBA EMEA master pricing file PPLv74-ed3-it1. - FN FBA solution Hardware and Software based on partner released products
- Currency listed only in USD. Refer to Euro/USD LCE exchange rate published on partner portal, Portfolio page [Support Assets/Currency Exchange rate]. - Changed quotations on maintenance/small networks - Tab "Cover": updated structure - Tab "maintenance": Added % with 1st year warranty credit included. - Modified: BoM Quoting, and focused it on Equipment BoM quoting - Removed tab: Pricing formulas. The Pricing Rules documents will prevail. - Tab: "ECO FN FBA tbd": new Export Compliance related ECCNs extract
Product Notifications:
- To receive notifications on product updates, manufacture discontinued dates and other product status changes, please subscribe to Notifications in OLCS (Nokia’s on-line customer support website). - To receive notifications on partner price catalog updates, please subscribe to Notifications in Partner Portal/Partner Personal space
For more information:
Pricing information is available in Partner Personal folder on the Nokia PRM Partner Portal. Please contact me should you have any questions.
Bogdan Vasilescu Nokia Global Partner Program and Sales Team Connect with us ©{{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia | Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
